articles.title: BBC, BA and Boots issued with ultimatum by cyber gang Clop - BBC
articles.description: The group warns personal details of 100,000 staff will be published if employers do not get in touch.
articles.content:
A prolific cyber crime gang thought to be based in Russia has issued an ultimatum to victims of a hack that has hit organisations around the world.

articles.title: Diageo boss Ivan Menezes dies aged 63 after short illness - The Guardian
articles.description: Menezes ‘built extraordinary legacy’ during his decade as chief executive, says chair of £75bn drinks firm
articles.content:
Sir Ivan Menezes, the long-serving boss of the worlds biggest spirits maker Diageo, has died at the age of 63 after a short illness.
Menezes, who was chief executive of the £75bn London-listed alcoh… [+7535 chars]
